Articles.Content: Hi I have Android 4.4.4 and I can not download the app because it does not appear in Google Play. I'm from Spain what can happen?

Welcome aboard!

There is no official KSP app for mobile platforms. Are you referring to a third party app?
The app doesn't appear in the Play Store for me either, and the author hasn't been on the forums since February. Perhaps it was taken down, not really sure.

[http://ul.to/vnyyesnq](http://ul.to/vnyyesnq)

not tested for function.

> 
> I'm from Spain what can happen?

it could get very hot over there, as i remember.

also, there might be much tourists in the summer time you should be aware of.

...and IIRC, its hard to find a job over there ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

you are welcome

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-14T17:25:08Z" title="07/14/2015 05:25  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 14, 2015</time> by Speadge**
